name: Job-Changing Janitor Fights Off Zombies And Tries To Save Patients At A Hospital
name_original: Job-Changing Janitor Fights Off Zombies And Tries To Save Patients At A Hospital
description:
Job-Changing Janitor Fights Off Zombies And Tries To Save Patients At A Hospital (JCJFOZATTSPAAH for short) is a game about a job-changing janitor who fights off zombies and tries to save patients at a hospital.

Use supply closets to change between classes! Shoot zombies as a soldier!

Use ancient healing magicks as a doctor

Mop the floors and make them slippery as a janitor!

Whatever you do, keep those patients alive!
